Articles.Content:
Soooo... it goes like this, you say your favorite seasons and a few reasons why you like it so much then the next person says a few things about the season that they hate, and say their favorite, and goes on from there

I.E.

player 1: summer, you can swim

player 2: theres so many bloodsucking bugs, its hot and muggy, and the suns beating down on you all day. Fall

so, yeah, mine`s winter
Ughhh, It's so white and cold! Summer

Autumn. 

Nice weather, it's green after monsoon rains, the smell of roasting green chile.
